```{r}
test_df = perfect_fragments(simulate_RNA(80), "Simulated_RNA_1")
test_df$apex_rt = predict(rf_model, test_df)
ggplot(test_df, aes(x=monoisotopic_mass, y = apex_rt)) +
  geom_point(aes(y = apex_rt), color = "red", size = 2, alpha = 0.7) +
  theme_bw()
```
